title: Tilapia gumbo
ingredients: ['475ml water', '2 beef stock cubes', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2-3 sticks celery, chopped', '1 small green pepper, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '250g okra, trimmed and chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon red chilli flakes', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 bay leaf', '1/8 teaspoon hot sauce', '450g tilapia fillets, cut into 2.5cm pieces']
